participant_1.background:
I fear that my family will be judged for the way they are.
I am not close to my family but I want to be.
i like sleeping.
i love to socialize.
I realized that losing my mind was the first step to winning.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
i like to create websites.
I do my best to support my family and be there for them.
my major was american literature and education.

content.text: It was nice to meet you today.
Likewise. Thank you for the opportunity to chat.
You are welcome. Do you have any big plans for the weekend?
I am helping my mom with a charity event she is hosting. I am not sure what I will do after that.
That sounds nice. You are a good son.
Thank you. I try to be. My family is everything to me.
I am not very close to my family. I wish I could be more like you.
It is never too late. I have been working on improving my relationship with my family for a few years now. It has not been easy, but it is worth it.
I am glad to hear it. I am not sure where to start.
Why don't you start by reaching out to them and telling them how you feel?
I am afraid they will judge me.
You are not giving them enough credit. I am sure they love you and want to be close to you.
You are right. I will give it a try.
I am proud of you. I know it will not be easy, but I am here for you if you need anything.
Thank you so much. I really appreciate your support.
